titles: An answer to a papisticall byll, cast in the streetes of Northampton, and brought before the iudges at the last syses. 1570
author: Knell, Thomas.
publisher: By Iohn Awdely dwellyng in litle Britain streete wythout Aldersgate,
notes: In verse. Reprints and replies to a Catholic broadside of which the first line is given as "How now my maisters maryed priestes,". The first line of the reply is "How now my masters popish priestes,".
Followed by a section in prose.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 385 and at reel 1277 (same copy filmed twice).
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
How now my maisters maryed priestes --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
